title: Simulation-Based Professional Development Curriculum for Enhancing MPA Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of foundational MPA program theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized educational program enhancing theory-practice integration for current professionals, operating in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define at least three MPA professional competencies by developing personal learning plans
Derive practical solutions for at least two specific workplace problems through peer coaching activities
Execute organizational policy analysis and improvement strategies in simulated/VR environments for at least three scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
